t: Amazon to build state-of-the-art robotics distribution center in Fort Myers
s: November 20, 2024 - Amazon officially announced its plans to build a robotics distribution center in Fort Myers. It paid $66.5 million for the site, off State Road 82.

t: Pulling back: Amazon drops plans for massive warehouse and distribution center in Fort Myers
s: September 14, 2022 - Amazon has backed out of "Project Rainforest" in Fort Myers. It's yet another casualty of the e-retail giant's decision to pull back on its U.S. expansion plans, in the wake of unexpected losses.
